query:
ALTER TABLE evidence_packs 
ADD COLUMN policyText TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionRef VARCHAR(64) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionChannel VARCHAR(64) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionAmount VARCHAR(64) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionCurrency VARCHAR(8) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionStatus VARCHAR(32) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionTimestamp TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN dualControlRequired INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN escalationTriggered INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN overrideApplied INT DEFAULT 0;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user zFXp9RNvPn4ZSGY.f4c672cde8f4 --database AKEywqHrvuBg7Sz2tPDLPz --execute ALTER TABLE evidence_packs 
ADD COLUMN policyText TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionRef VARCHAR(64) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionChannel VARCHAR(64) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionAmount VARCHAR(64) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionCurrency VARCHAR(8) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionStatus VARCHAR(32) NULL,
ADD COLUMN executionTimestamp TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN dualControlRequired INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN escalationTriggered INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN overrideApplied INT DEFAULT 0;
